revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DWL-2100AP |revision=A4 |upc=790069263958 |asin=B00019EYVG |fcc_date=07/15/2004 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WAP-D19 |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |type=access point |fcc_id=RRK2004042018-1 |ic_id=4216A-WL2100AP |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2313A |cpu1_cspeed=180 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV322A-70TI |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V28S40BTP |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2313A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:19:5B,00:1C:F0,00:22:B0 |oui_eth=00:19:5B,00:1C:F0,00:22:B0 }} {{TagLine|AirPlus XtremeG Wireless Access Point}} :[http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/2/243_b.html Product page] (RU) {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DWL-2100AP}}
"8WAPD19..3A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Alpha Networks]] WAP-D19
===Chips=== * CPU: [[Atheros]] AR2313A WiSoC * Wireless tranciever: [[Atheros]] AR2112A * Ethernet-MII bridge: IC+ IP101A * Ethernet MDI/X detection: TS6121C * Flash: ''AMD'' M29LV320DB (4MB) * RAM: ''ICSI'' IC42S16800-7T (16MB)
The DD-WRT router database states that A1 uses the AR2312 :and the A2/A3/A4 versions use the AR2313A.
====Hardware==== *[http://www.sown.org.uk/wiki/DWL-2100AP DWL-2100AP on '''SOWN Wiki'''] :D-Link Hardware revision: A4, Firmware revision: 2.20EU :*CPU: [[Atheros]] AR2313A-001, B52307B, 0635 TAIWAN :*Flash: ''Spansion'' S29GL032M90TFIR4, 0634CRM-K (4MB) :*RAM: ''ESMT'' M12L128168A-7T, AZG1P536E, 0610 (16MB) :*Eth: ''IC+'' IP101A-LF, 0640C15, KPF0005.1 (10/100Mbps)
===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dwl-2100ap On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=14050 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://web.archive.org/web/20060114111758/http://www.mervin.net.au/wireless/template/dwl2100hacks.php How to increase ''DWL-2100AP Power and Frequency Range''] :(via the Wayback Machine) *[https://web.archive.org/web/20060204173942/http://www.wavedale.net/202f.htm More information (in German)] (via the Wayback Machine)
===Serial=== *Serial connector: JP2 *JTAG connector: J5 ====Pinouts==== {|border=1 |pin4 |pin3 |pin2 |empty |pin1 |- |RX |Ground |VCC +3.3V |align=center| -  |TX |}
